text: On (and off) The Road (1981–1984) is the sixth of the major box set releases from English progressive rock group King Crimson, released in 2016 by Discipline Global Mobile & Panegyric Records. Across 11 CDs, 3 Blu-ray audio and video discs, 3 DVD-As and 2 DVDs is a limited edition box set featuring studio and live recordings – many previously unreleased – from King Crimson's 1980's live line-up. It includes the 2011 stereo and 5.1 surround mixes of Discipline, with the 2016 stereo and 5.1 surround mixes of Beat and Three of a Perfect Pair by Steven Wilson and Robert Fripp. ==Track listing== ==References== == External links == * Category:King Crimson albums Category:2016 albums Category:Discipline Global Mobile albums
